Skills.Name: Regenerate 1
Skills.Description: Recovers a tiny amount of HP every 4 seconds.

Skills.Name: Regenerate 2
Skills.Description: Recovers more HP. Superior skill to Regenerate 1.

Skills.Name: Regenerate 3
Skills.Description: Recovers much more HP. Superior skill to Regenerate 2.

Skills.Name: Twin Spear
Skills.Description: Throw two spears at once with charge attack or during Fever.

Skills.Name: Twin Spear
Skills.Description: Throw four spears. Superior skill to Twin Spears.

Skills.Name: Twin Spear
Skills.Description: Throw six spears. Superior skill to Four Spears.

Skills.Name: Bloodsuck 1
Skills.Description: Absorbs 10% of damage inflicted upon enemy (recovers HP).

Skills.Name: Bloodsuck 2
Skills.Description: Absorbs 30% of damage inflicted. Superior skill to Bloodsuck 1.

Skills.Name: Bloodsuck 3
Skills.Description: Absorbs 60% of damage inflicted. Superior skill to Bloodsuck 2.

Skills.Name: Kamaitachi 1
Skills.Description: Creates small tornadoes. Activates with charge attack.

Skills.Name: Fire Tornado
Skills.Description: Gong Tornado Uberhero ability creates flaming tornadoes which spread fire in marching direction.

Skills.Name: Kamaitachi 2
Skills.Description: Creates two small tornadoes. Superior skill to Kamaitachi.

Skills.Name: Rush 'Em
Skills.Description: Score multiple hits in an extreme stampede.

Skills.Name: Grubby
Skills.Description: Flame flies spawn from defeated enemies.
Skills.Tip: Attack ONLY SMALL ENEMIES, like Myamsar grinding.

Skills.Name: Shish-kabob
Skills.Description: x1.5 damage when attacking foes who lack shields or greatshields.
Skills.Tip: Attack ONLY SMALL ENEMIES, like Myamsar grinding. DON'T ATTACK ANY SHIELD HOLDER.

Skills.Name: Duck and Cover
Skills.Description: Adds min. Attack Power to Defense. Minimum Attack Power becomes zero.
Skills.Tip: Just take damage. Eyeball shield is recommended to PREVENT SHIELD EVASION. (Note: original version of Patapon 3 can't gain exp due to the bug.)

Skills.Name: Deep Sleep
Skills.Description: Self-destructs upon death in a localized poof of sleeping gas.
Skills.Tip: Just die. You may ask help people to multiplay VS. Sadly, there's no equivalent grinding way as Myamsar, due to the lack of relevalent set skill (also no Ton/Chin/Kan).

Skills.Name: Return to Sender
Skills.Description: When hit by slice or strike attack during CHAKA CHAKA defense, damage is deflected back at enemy.
Skills.Tip: Take damage, but ONLY SLASH/STRIKE types.

Skills.Name: Instacharge
Skills.Description: Attack speed boost allowing faster firing of cannon.
Skills.Tip: Note: original version of Patapon 3 can't gain exp due to the bug.

Skills.Name: Body Piercing
Skills.Description: Adds piercing attack when equipped with cannon or blunderbuss.
Skills.Tip: EQUIP CANNON OR BLUNDERBUSS. (Note: original version of Patapon 3 can't gain exp due to the bug.)

Skills.Name: Tainted
Skills.Description: Copies the poison rate of the most poisonous ally.
